plot: What happens to our imaginations when we are left alone? And what creatures are conjured to occupy the space our loneliness now controls?
title: Fairytales
plot_es: What happens to our imaginations when we are left alone? And what creatures are conjured to occupy the space our loneliness now controls?
plot_en: What happens to our imaginations when we are left alone? And what creatures are conjured to occupy the space our loneliness now controls?
